section.title: Frames - Using Regions
section.description: While the above script works, it is inconvenient to have to count the number of columns and rows that the frame will enclose. A more typical way to use the {Frame} command is to enclose the entire section of the dialog that you want to enclose in a {Region}{Endregion} command pair. This command pair instructs Alpha Anywhere to treat all of the enclosed cells as a single cell. The {frame} command can then be written as {Frame=1,1:text}.
